solution_line_template: In the afternoon, she baked {morning_cupcakes} + {afternoon_additional_cupcakes} = <<{morning_cupcakes}+{afternoon_additional_cupcakes}={afternoon_cupcakes}>>{afternoon_cupcakes} cupcakes more cupcakes.
Therefore, she baked a total of {morning_cupcakes} + {afternoon_cupcakes} = <<{morning_cupcakes}+{afternoon_cupcakes}={total_cupcakes}>>{total_cupcakes} cupcakes.
